full_output.summary: Results-driven software developer with expertise in JavaScript (Node.js, React.js) and a proven ability to write clean, well-designed code. Skilled in effectively communicating technology ideas and issues with peers and management. Seeking a challenging role to apply my skills in developing applications that meet business requirements while ensuring code quality and organization. Proficient in multitasking, working independently, and possessing strong written and verbal communication skills.

experiences.description: Collaborated with senior developers to design, develop, and deploy features for the travel booking platform. Integrated various APIs to enhance functionality and streamline data exchange processes, ensuring seamless communication between different software systems. Implemented backend functionalities using Nestjs and MySQL, ensuring data integrity and seamless user experiences. Assisted in optimizing website performance, reducing loading times by 20% through code optimization and caching strategies. Participated in code reviews, offering constructive feedback and ensuring coding standards were upheld. Actively engaged in troubleshooting and resolving technical issues, contributing to improved user satisfaction.

Contributed to UniHawk study abroad website development, designing several pages and implementing data fetching functionalities. Utilized Laravel for backend tasks and MySQL for database integration. Collaborated with team to deliver high-quality features. Additionally, worked on another project involving Node.js and Express for API development. Conducted research on emerging technologies. Worked with Git for version control.

full_output.name: SURAJ KUMAR
